title: A Corrosion-Free Zinc Metal Battery with Ultra-Thin Zinc Anode and High Depth of Discharge
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04320G, Paper
Rui Yao, Yunxiang Zhao, Lumeng Wang, Chengxiang Xiao, Feiyu Kang, Chunyi Zhi, Cheng Yang
Zinc metal battery featuring high capacity, low cost, and environmental benignity has been receiving more attention than ever. Regrettably, due to the intrinsic thermodynamic instability of metallic zinc in conventional...
